$description:
| What does this do? | Disable future user's ability to install add-ins in Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint helps reduce your threat-surface and mitigate this risk. |
| Why should you use this? | Attackers commonly use vulnerable and custom-built add-ins to access data in user applications. |
| What is the end-user impact? | End users will not be able to install add-ins that they may want to install. |
| Learn more | [Manage self-service purchases and trials](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/commerce/subscriptions/manage-self-service-purchases-admins?view=o365-worldwide) |
